messages.message:
Welcome to the Symbaroum system


We are happy that you are using our system and wish you best of luck.
If you want to give some feedback on the system, the developers are active on both the Foundry Discord (channel #free-league) and Davokar Explorers Discord.

Head's up


Foundry is going to release v0.8 in a couple of months - this is a big change and we will try to keep all users of the Symbaroum System up to date with our progress on making it compatible with the new version of Foundry.

Head's up


We plan to release a new version of Symbaroum when the new Foundry 0.8 is released in stable. This is however not tested with the same rigour and time as other releases, so take care before you upgrade and make sure to make a backup of your '\FoundryVTT\Data' in advance.
Currently there is not a version of the system that will work under FVTT 0.8.x.
We are testing a new version and will release the details as soon as we are satisfied it is stable.
